attributes.action: Explain how Tommy Robinson was tried and convicted in a matter of hours
attributes.background: Tommy Robinson was reporting on a case of human interest watched by thousands Tommy Robinson reporting was live streamed and it was clear there was no wrong doing witness by thousands of people. The nature course of justice takes months yet Tommy Robinson was jailed within hours of his arrest.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because it's about something that the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for. This is the responsibility of the courts, which are independent of the Government and Parliament.
